article.title: Rothstein Assigned to NATO Air Training Command

tags.tag: NATO Training Mission-Afghanistan/Combined Security Transition Command-Afghanistan

article.text: Brig. Gen. Michael D. Rothstein, USAF, has been assigned as commanding general, NATO Air Training Command-Afghanistan, NATO Training Mission-Afghanistan/Combined Security Transition Command-Afghanistan, and commander, 438th Air Expeditionary Wing, Air Combat Command, Kabul, Afghanistan.
